text: Andrew Jesse McDonald (September 5, 1898 – August 21, 1988) was an American football and basketball player and coach. He served as the head football coach (1934–1937) and head basketball coach (1925–1950) at Southwest Missouri State Normal School—now known as Missouri State University—in Springfield, Missouri. McDonald was a two-sport athlete at the University of Kansas, starting at quarterback in football and playing basketball under legendary head coach Phog Allen. ==Head coaching record== ===Football=== ==References== ==External links== * Category:1898 births Category:1988 deaths Category:American football ends Category:American football quarterbacks Category:Basketball coaches from Kansas Category:Kansas Jayhawks football players Category:Kansas Jayhawks men's basketball players Category:Missouri State Bears football coaches Category:Missouri State Bears basketball coaches Category:College golf coaches in the United States Category:People from McLouth, Kansas Category:Players of American football from Kansas Category:Basketball players from Kansas
title: Andrew McDonald (coach)
